advancedTab/noConfigsText: You have no unsaved changes - edit values above to see overrides here.

schematicsError.title: The config schematics contains errors in the following fields:

prediction.systemPrompt/description: Use this field to provide background instructions to the model, such as a set of rules, constraints, or general requirements.
prediction.structured/description: Advanced: you can provide a [JSON Schema](https://json-schema.org/learn/miscellaneous-examples) to enforce a particular output format from the model. Read the [documentation](https://lmstudio.ai/docs/advanced/structured-output) to learn more
prediction.tools/description: Advanced: you can provide a JSON-compliant list of tools for the model to request calls to. Read the [documentation](https://lmstudio.ai/docs/advanced/tool-use) to learn more

load.contextLength/warning: Setting a high value for context length can significantly impact memory usage

llama.vCacheQuantizationType/turnedOnWarning: ⚠️ You must disable this value if Flash Attention is not enabled
llama.vCacheQuantizationType/disabledMessage: Can only be turned on when Flash Attention is enabled
llama.vCacheQuantizationType/invalidF32MetalSt: ⚠️ You must disable flash attention when using F32

mlx.kvCacheBits/turnedOnWarning: Context Length setting is ignored when using KV Cache Quantization

gpuStrictVramCap.customSubTitleOff: OFF: Allow model weights to offload to shared memory if dedicated GPU memory is full
gpuStrictVramCap.customSubTitleOn: ON: The system will limit offload of model weights to dedicated GPU memory and RAM only. Context may still use shared memory
gpuStrictVramCap.customGpuOffloadWarning: Model offload limited to dedicated GPU memory. Actual number of offloaded layers may differ

load.allGpusDisabledWarning: All GPUs are currently disabled. Enable at least one to offload

separateLoad/description.1: The preset also includes the following load-time configuration. Load time config are model-wide and requires reloading the model to take effect. Hold

apiIdentifier.label: API Identifier
apiIdentifier.hint: Optionally provide an identifier for this model. This will be used in API requests. Leave blank to use the default identifier.

idleTTL.label: Auto Unload If Idle (TTL)
idleTTL.hint: If set, the model will be automatically unloaded after being idle for the specified amount of time.

manual._value: New fields detected. You will be able to choose which changes to include in the preset.

hold.1: to choose which changes to commit to the preset.
to only save changes to fields that are already included in the preset.

commitChanges.manual/description: Choose which changes to include in the preset.

environmentVariables.info: If you're unsure, leave these at their default values

gpus.information: Configure graphics processing units (GPUs) detected on your machine
